description:
This course goes over a vast amount of information for enhancing the development of athletes at all levels. In developing any athlete there needs to be a foundation to grow from. We help everyone in this course to go from a foundation all athletes can start from to the ability to grow into a large amount of complex abilites in gaining a better athlete who is Faster, Quicker, and more Agile.

When comparing one athlete to another we look for comparison in their 40 yard dash, vertical jump, bench press, and cone drills. When making the comparisons we look at who has faster times , higher jumps, who is stronger, and has the best times in the cone drills. This information general stated: who is the better athlete?

Becoming a better athlete is possible for everyone who has the desire.This is obtainable through hard work and an understanding of a few major princples in exercise science. We will cover the neccessary princples from muscle physiology, periodization, and the metabolic demands placed on every athlete.

This course will enhance every athletes potential by the means of enhancing sport specific skills.

  • The course has over 4 hours of materieal
  • You will get over 120 drills in speed, agility, and quickness that are downloadable
  • I recommend go over each lecture many times because of the large amount of information contained within this course.
title: How to develop, Speed , Agility, and Quickness
instructors: Ammon     Stephens    B.S. CSCS CPT PES:
